Package telrun.shortnik.service

Class UrlServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
telrun.shortnik.service.UrlServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
UrlService
@Service public class UrlServiceImpl extends Object implements UrlService
A service for working with the Url class.

    • createUrl

      public String createUrl(UrlRequest urlRequest, User user)
      Create a new link in the database.
      Specified by:
      createUrl in interface UrlService
      Parameters:
      urlRequest - An object containing information about the url to be created by the user.
      user - An object obtained from the authentication context representing the user using the app.
      Returns:
      The short generated link.

    • getLongUrlByShortName

      @Cacheable(cacheNames="url") public String getLongUrlByShortName(String urlShort)
      This method searches the database for the corresponding original link using a short alias. Для возвращаемого Caching in memory is used for optimizing read operations for the return value.
      Specified by:
      getLongUrlByShortName in interface UrlService
      Parameters:
      urlShort - The short alias previously created by the application and stored in the database.
      Returns:
      The original link for further redirection.

    • deleteUrl

      @CacheEvict(cacheNames="url") public void deleteUrl(String shortUrl)
      A method for deleting a URL based on its corresponding short alias. The method also removes the URL from the application's cache.
      Specified by:
      deleteUrl in interface UrlService
      Parameters:
      shortUrl - The short alias previously created by the application and stored in the database.

    • cleanDatabase

      @CacheEvict(cacheNames="url") public void cleanDatabase()
      This method clears the database of outdated URLs. URLs older than the class's static variable URL_LIFE_TIME_HOURS.
      Specified by:
      cleanDatabase in interface UrlService
